title: Shadow Boxer Active Plus + (2013) PC [ENG] Foxy Games
description:
Game Description:
******************
ShadowBoxer Active+ combines the world of boxercise with high energy music to create a truly immersive and rewarding gaming experience! Set yourself personal fitness targets and enjoy simple addictive rhythm based gaming at its best!

ShadowBoxer Active+ combines the world of boxercise with high energy music to create a truly immersive and rewarding gaming experience! Set yourself personal fitness targets and enjoy simple addictive rhythm based gaming at its best!

ShadowBoxer Active+ uses any off-the-shelf webcam to track you in full 3D, and uses your motions as the input to the game; imagine Dance Central mixed with Guitar Hero, but with boxing movements and you're almost there.

ShadowBoxer Active+ uses any off-the-shelf webcam to track you in full 3D, and uses your motions as the input to the game; imagine Dance Central mixed with Guitar Hero, but with boxing movements and you're almost there.

Punch your way through the various workout routines, set new personal best scores and track your fitness levels! 

Play through the levels and unlock DUB FX and exclusive new remix content for the final showdown. The perfect party game.


Game Features:
***************

    3 Individual Workout Modes: Endurance, Hill Climb & Interval (with the         
    option of increasing intensity through the resistance kit)
    15 Thumping Music Tracks, featuring DubFX and Toasty Taylor
    Integrated motion controlled punch input gameplay
    Individual Player profiles with; stats and progress overview
    Un-lockable environments, music tracks and characters through the in-game shop
    Achievements, BeatCredits (in-game currency) and Star collection system
    Quick-play mode to jump in and play at any time (party mode)
    Facebook Integration; score, calorie burn and progress in game


Game Info
***********
PreCracked - Just Install and Play
RePacked by: Foxy Games
Released: 15 December 2013
Size: 300 Mb
Platform: PC / Windows 7 or 8
Genre(s): Alternative Sport

Minimum Requirements:

- Minimum Camera Resolution : VGA (640x480)
- Range : 1.5m - 4m for webcam distance
- Lighting : 30 Lux and higher

- CPU: Dual Core 1.4GHz
- Min RAM: 512 MB
- DirectX: 9.0 or Higher
- OS: Windows 7 or Higher

Instructions:
**************
1.Download - 2.Install - 3.Play and Have Fun - 4.Keep Seeding!
